mapper.select: SELECT coup_code FROM coupon ORDER BY coup_idx LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coupon_used(coup_idx, member_email, coup_useable) VALUES( (SELECT coup_idx FROM coupon WHERE coup_idx = #{coup_idx}), (SELECT MEMBER_EMAIL FROM member WHERE MEMBER_EMAIL = #{member_email}), 'Y' )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM coupon WHERE coup_idx in (select coup_idx from coupon_used where coup_useable = 'Y' and member_email=#{member_email})
